sentence: pic.twitter.com/mXdRYPAMMG — Blake Masters (@bgmasters) November 3, 2021 Noting that the radical Left was “up in arms” over the observation, he said “a Republican politician or candidate is allowed to say ‘Critical Race Theory is bad.’ And I think some of the braver ones are even allowed to say, ‘it’s racist.’” But one can’t proceed from there: If you actually go and unpack that a little bit more, and say, “this is straight-up anti-white racism,” I mean the hit pieces just float in.
author: R. Cort Kirkwood
title: Masters Again: CRT Is “Anti-white Racism”
